img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Snowhill_25.jpg)
Instead, return to the temple entrance and look for stairs leading upward. Be wary of more Frozen Corpses coming to life as you ascend, and another will try and ambush you from the left as you reach the next landing.
img_below_text:
There's another Yaksha Patroller here waiting to challenge you, so try and isolate him first by luring the corpses down the stairs and then take him out. Once again, there's another green Wisp to absorb on the right to get some gourd healing back.
As you head to the end of the raised platform, you'll find a snowy sloping path off to the right, and another stairway path going straight ahead.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Snowhill 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Snowhill_25.jpg)
Instead, return to the temple entrance and look for stairs leading upward. Be wary of more Frozen Corpses coming to life as you ascend, and another will try and ambush you from the left as you reach the next landing."
        - Following Text: "There's another Yaksha Patroller here waiting to challenge you, so try and isolate him first by luring the corpses down the stairs and then take him out. Once again, there's another green Wisp to absorb on the right to get some gourd healing back.
As you head to the end of the raised platform, you'll find a snowy sloping path off to the right, and another stairway path going straight ahead."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in a snowy environment outside a temple in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, armed with a staff, is engaged in battle with two enemies: a large, muscular foe and a skeletal figure. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's description of ascending stairs near the temple and encountering hostile Frozen Corpses. The setting emphasizes the need for strategic combat as players progress through the area.
